name: Create Incident Report
description: Creates a structured incident report in Elasticsearch and optionally sends a Slack notification. Use this tool LAST, after you have gathered all evidence from anomaly detection, deployment correlation, past incidents, and runbooks. Provide a complete incident summary including root cause, severity, and recommended remediation.

title.description: Short, descriptive incident title including the affected service

severity.description: Incident severity: P1 (customer-facing outage), P2 (degraded service), P3 (internal/minor)

root_cause.description: Detailed root cause analysis based on evidence gathered

recommended_action.description: Recommended remediation steps, starting with the most urgent action

evidence_summary.description: Summary of evidence: anomaly data, deployment correlation, historical patterns
